title: defaultvolume
description: Update the default volume for a server.
---

Update the default volume for a server.

## Usage

```sh
;defaultvolume <new volume percentage>
```

## Examples

```sh
# set the default volume to 50%
;defaultvolume 50
```

## Aliases

- default-volume
